item.title: [solved]Simple item command help
item.dc:creator: @basse747 basse747
item.description:
@basse747 wrote:

[quote=“Driman Rune, post:2, topic:518528”]Here i got this from a 667 source from many a year ago and couple months ago i don’t know if this can fit your.

[b]if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("item") && (player.getRights() == 2)) { try { String username = cmd[1].substring(cmd[1].indexOf(" ") + 1); Player target = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(username); int itemId = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]); ItemDefinitions defs = ItemDefinitions.getItemDefinitions(itemId); return false; public void spawn (); // this gives me error item=true; // this gives me error spawneditem().addItem(itemId, slotint) // this gives me error public void int (); // this gives me error set false; // this gives me error String name = defs == null ? "" : defs.getName().toLowerCase(); target.getInventory().addItem(itemId, cmd.length >= 3 ? Integer.valueOf(cmd[2]) : 1); } catch (NumberFormatException e) { player.getPackets().sendGameMessage("Use: ::itemt username id (optional:amount)"); } return true; }[/b][/quote]

item.title: [solved]Simple item command help
item.dc:creator: @Driman_Rune Driman Rune
item.description:
@Driman_Rune wrote:

Here i got this from a 667 source from many a year ago and couple months ago i don’t know if this can fit your.

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“item”) && (player.getRights() == 2)) {
try {
String username = cmd[1].substring(cmd[1].indexOf(" ") + 1);
Player target = World.getPlayerByDisplayName(username);
int itemId = Integer.valueOf(cmd[1]);
ItemDefinitions defs = ItemDefinitions.getItemDefinitions(itemId);
return false;
public void spawn ();
item=true;
spawneditem().addItem(itemId, slotint)
public void int ();
set false;
String name = defs == null ? “” : defs.getName().toLowerCase();
target.getInventory().addItem(itemId,
cmd.length >= 3 ? Integer.valueOf(cmd[2]) : 1);
} catch (NumberFormatException e) {
player.getPackets().sendGameMessage(“Use: ::itemt username id (optional:amount)”);
}
return true;
}

Read full topic
